about_the_game:
An arcade beat em up with a metroid-vania twist; siblings Riley and Archie fight their way through the labyrinth of a spooky haunted mansion.

EXPLORE

Tackle the winding rooms and hallways of a haunted mansion. Encounter puzzles, secrets and meet the wild and wonderful array of things living here; both friend and foe. The four wings of the mansion give a varied and challenging array of colourful characters to interact with and recruit.

FIGHT

Battle your way through hordes of the mansion's inhabitants from slimes to zombies to the existential dread that maybe, just maybe, you might not make it out. Each wing is held captive by it's evil boss, fight through the labyrinth to get to the boss and defeat them once and for all.

TEAM UP

Fight in 2 player co-op as siblings Riley and Archie learn how to navigate the unforgiving halls of terror, or tackle the mansion solo leaving the other sibling to a twisted fate.
